track.name: Smash Lies
comments:
I can agree that this track is extremely tumultuous. It's one of his best though.
"Wake up, stand up, and jump off to this!"
"wake up, stand up and jump off to this" catchy as hell
a bit chaotic, but kinda cool
beau99: I don't think its auto-tune. Sounds like a vocoder with wah-wah
stand up and jump off to this!

What the heck is with the auto-tune in this song?

He doesn't need it, but decides to use it anyway :/
It sounded way better live. It was a more traditional Matisyahu song. I liked it better.

Aww... I was hoping that Matisyahu would move back in the direction of Shake Off the Dust since I really, really disliked Youth. He's moved even farther in the direction of pop though - his choice, but makes me sad.
Sounds more like timbaland's influence but still - good!

OMG!!! Matisyahu kaum wiederzuerkennen... ziemlich poppig... enttäuschend... :( bad

Die andern Lieder auf der EP sind erheblich besser.
total surprise from matis. but still positive :)
